014package org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.config;
015
016import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
017import java.lang.reflect.Method;
018
019import org.jdbi.v3.core.config.ConfigRegistry;
020
021/**
022 * Configures {@link ConfigRegistry} instances to satisfy the contract of a
023 * {@link ConfiguringAnnotation}-annotated annotation.
024 */
025public interface Configurer {
026    /**
027     * Configures the registry for the given annotation on a sql object type.
028     *
029     * @param registry      the registry to configure
030     * @param annotation    the annotation
031     * @param sqlObjectType the sql object type which was annotated
032     */
033    default void configureForType(ConfigRegistry registry, Annotation annotation, Class<?> sqlObjectType) {
034        throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Not supported for type");
035    }
036
037    /**
038     * Configures the registry for the given annotation on a sql object method.
039     *
040     * @param registry      the registry to configure
041     * @param annotation    the annotation
042     * @param sqlObjectType the sql object type
043     * @param method        the method which was annotated
044     */
045    default void configureForMethod(ConfigRegistry registry, Annotation annotation, Class<?> sqlObjectType, Method method) {
046        throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Not supported for method");
047    }
048}
